PageTitle: Simplify file sharing with external users in public rooms | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: Easily interact with third-parties in ONLYOFFICE DocSpace. Integrate public rooms into any web interface
SimplifyFileSharingWithExternalUsers: Simplify file sharing with external users in <0>public rooms</0>
EasilyInteractWithThirdParties: Easily interact with third-parties in ONLYOFFICE DocSpace
AbsolutelySafe: Absolutely safe for your office files
EasyToStore: Easy to store where you want
PublicSharingDesc: Invite any users who don't have direct access to your DocSpace such as partners, sponsors, subcontractors, etc., via external links to allow them to view, edit, review, and comment files without registration. Generate multiple links with different parameters, if necessary.
AbsolutelySafeDesc: For additional protection, set a password and limit the link by time period, restrict file content copy, file downloading and printing.
EasyToStoreDesc: Use third-party services as data storage for your Public rooms: Google Drive, One Drive, Box, Dropbox, kDrive, Nextcloud, ownCloud, and others working via the WebDAV protocol.
SeamlesslyEmbeddableDesc: Easily integrate public rooms into any web interface. This way, users of your website or service will be able to access the room files directly from the web frontend.
CostEffectiveDesc: Betaal uitsluitend voor beheerders en voeg gratis een onbeperkt aantal gewone gebruikers en gasten toe. Profiteer van een gratis Startup abonnement voor kleine teams. ONLYOFFICE DocSpace is geschikt voor alle bedrijven, ongeacht of het gaat om een kleine of middelgrote onderneming of een grote onderneming. Wilt u volledige controle over uw bedrijfsgegevens? Implementeer DocSpace op uw priv√©server.

BlogDesc: How to embed a public room into your website
MasterONLYOFFICEDocSpace: Krijg ONLYOFFICE DocSpace onder de knie met videogidsen
